intro: Diodia angustata, commonly known as narrowleaf diodia, is a flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. Diodia angustata is often found in disturbed habitats and is considered a weed in some agricultural settings.
